short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reply to and show latest emails on top of Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By showing Gmail threads latest to oldest, this extension allows you to read the latest messages and reply to threads more efficiently.

Simply install the plugin, refresh Gmail, and you are good to go!

For any updates for requested features, please leave a comment.

Note:
This extension does not modify the original emails or their content. It simply reorganizes the display order within Gmail threads for easier access and navigation.
